entry.title: Let’s Encrypt your site with NGINX
entry.summary: Since Google made the change to its ranking system for sites who use HTTPS instead of HTTP, finally websites started going over to the encrypted protocol. But instead of buying expensive certificates Let’s Encrypt solves this problem for us at zero cost.
